record.dc:title: 83BN12 Eva, Benton County, Tennessee. Burials 6BN115 and 6BN116. Burial 115 - Adult, at right. Burial 116 - Infant, at left. Stratum II top. Square 50R3. Direction Southwest.
record.wpa:narrative: [6BN115] Adult female(?) in good condition, fully flexed on right side and back, left arm folded at side, hand at shoulder, left arm same, left knee in chest, feet at pelvis with head to northwest. The large knife lies with the point within a broken pubic bone and with a foot bone over it. It is probably a grave furnishing rather than a weapon intruded into the body. [6BN116] Indeterminate infant in poor condition - at left in photo.
record.wpa:comments: Institution has illustrations of burial on file.
